situation.title: Partners of  Czechs and EU citizens living in the CZ
situation.meta_description: Rules of the arrival of partners to the Czech Republic.

content.processed:
Rules 

Foreigners can cross the borders of the Czech Republic due to the necessary trips to family or close people.

Followingly, they adhere to the rules for the entry of foreigners into the territory of the Czech Republic.

The ban on entry into the Czech Republic of foreigners from a third-country nationals who do not appear on the list of countries with a low risk of infection does not apply to foreigners, who living in a relationship or are family members with Czech citizens or EU member citizens with temporary residence in the Czech Republic. 

These foreigners are allowed to enter the Czech Republic based on a certificate issued by the Czech Ministry of Foreign Affairs. At the same time, he must either present a diplomatic note issued by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (certificate of covid-19 disease and isolation in a red or dark red country) or undergo an antigen or PCR test before traveling to the Czech Republic from a high risk countries. In case of routes from a country with a very high risk of infection, only PCR test is accepted.

For more information on confirming your partnership, please visit the Ministry of Foreign Affairs websites (only in Czech). Additional informations regarding the entrance to the Czech Republic can be found at the Ministry of Interior websites.
